column1: Smoque BBQ////The ribs are good without sauce
column2: but with their house bbq... dear
column3: sweet baby jesus... they could cure world peace issues. Lets just put it that way. They have amazing chew
column5: and pull from the bone perfectly. It's not melt away pull from the bone
column6: but it gives you that gnaw needed to strip the bone and that's amazing.
